titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Clarence Long (1878-1957) was a Presbyterian minister. He was called to the ministry in 1903 and was ordained in 1909. In 1914, Long began a ministry at Old Pine Street Church in Philadelphia that lasted forty-three years. Clarence Long's grandfather was James Henry Long and his uncle was James H. Long.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of daguerreotypes of members of the Long family. Included are two photographs of James Henry Long, James H. Long (as a child), George Jeffrey (as a young man) [possibly George Jeffrey Long], Emma Long (as a child), Mary Long (as a child), and two unidentified subjects.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
